verses.verse: O God <S%H430><s%>, my heart <S%H3820><s%> is fixed <S%H3559><s%>; I will sing <S%H7891><s%> and give praise <S%H2167><s%>, even with my glory <S%H3519><s%>.
Awake <S%H5782><s%>, psaltery <S%H5035><s%> and harp <S%H3658><s%>: I myself will awake <S%H5782><s%> early <S%H7837><s%>.
I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, among the people <S%H5971><s%>: and I will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto you among the nations <S%H3816><s%>.
For your mercy <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>: and your truth <S%H571><s%> reaches unto the clouds <S%H7834><s%>.
Be you exalted <S%H7311><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>: and your glory <S%H3519><s%> above all the earth <S%H776><s%>;
That your beloved <S%H3039><s%> may be delivered <S%H2502><s%>: save <S%H3467><s%> with your right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and answer me <S%H6030><s%>.

God <S%H430><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> in his holiness <S%H6944><s%>; I will rejoice <S%H5937><s%>, I will divide <S%H2505><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, and measure out <S%H4058><s%> the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%>.
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is mine <S%H4519><s%>; Manasseh is mine <S%H669><s%>; Ephraim also is the strength <S%H4581><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>; Judah <S%H3063><s%> is my lawgiver <S%H2710><s%>;
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my washpot <S%H7366><s%>; over Edom <S%H123><s%> will I cast out <S%H7993><s%> my shoe <S%H5275><s%>; over Philistia <S%H6429><s%> will I triumph <S%H7321><s%>.
Who will bring <S%H2986><s%> me into the strong <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>? who will lead <S%H5148><s%> me into Edom <S%H123><s%>?
Will not you <S%H430><s%>, O God, who have cast us off <S%H2186><s%>? and will not you <S%H430><s%>, O God, go forth <S%H3318><s%> with our hosts <S%H6635><s%>?
Give <S%H3051><s%> us help <S%H5833><s%> from trouble <S%H6862><s%>: for vain <S%H7723><s%> is the help <S%H8668><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>.
Through God <S%H430><s%> we shall do <S%H6213><s%> valiantly <S%H2428><s%>: for he it is that shall tread down <S%H947><s%> our enemies <S%H6862><s%>.
